description.zh-CN: 1919年德国包豪斯学派的风格，强谾几何形态和功能。展现几何精确度和功能现代主义。，展现几何精确度和功能现代主义原则。1919年德国包豪斯学校发源的设计风格。强调几何形式和功能现代主义。
description.en-US: Design style originating from the 1919 German Bauhaus school, emphasizing geometric forms and functional design Combines art with industrial production through mathematical precision and utilitarian aesthetics for modern functional design solutions Ideal for design-forward brands and functional-aesthetic applications Emphasizes grid-based composition and integration of art with industrial production This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. geometric precision and functional modernism. Excellence in design.
